of the Exchange Act. ☐                        
                             
  Item 8.01.  Other Events.  
                             
Wells Fargo & Company (the “Company”) issued  
press releases announcing the pricing and     
final results of the previously announced cash
tender offer for certain outstanding debt     
securities of the Company by Wells Fargo      
Securities, LLC, its indirect wholly-owned    
subsidiary. Copies of the press releases are  
attached as Exhibits 99.1 and 99.2 and are    
incorporated herein by reference.
